name: Happy Clicks
description:
Happy Clicks is a short idle/clicker game about building a small slice of heaven. Submitted for the GameDev.tv Jam 2022. Please rate and leave a comment on the submission page!

Tips
  • Hand getting tired? Turn on Auto-click in the settings menu.
  • Clicking falls off pretty quickly - manage your buildings instead!
  • There are 5 tiers of upgrades for each building, unlocked at 1, 5, 10, 20, and 50 buildings.
  • Pay attention to resource rates! Depending on how many upgrades you have unlocked, different buildings might be more valuable.
